pageContext.claim: “It's better and much more effective than the previous wall. And we actually can do it faster, and it's less expensive, if you can believe it. So it's better, faster, and less expensive. Other than that, who knows.”
pageContext.analysis: No new wall designs have been approved by Congress. Plus, experts say that Trump's full wall could cost around $25 billion and take 10,000 workers 10 years to build the 1,000 mile section Trump says that he wants.
